tool_description: Identifies gaps in coverage by analyzing multiple insurance policies or coverage sources that may apply to a claim.

primary_policy_coverage.description: Coverage details from primary insurance policy

secondary_policies.description: Coverage details from other applicable policies

claim_requirements.description: Coverage requirements based on claim circumstances

loss_amount.description: Total amount of loss or damage

error_messages: Primary policy required: Primary policy coverage details cannot be empty.
Invalid loss amount: Loss amount must be a positive number greater than 0.
Claim requirements missing: Specify coverage requirements based on claim circumstances.
Gap analysis failed: Unable to perform coverage gap analysis with provided information.
usage: Provide primary_policy_coverage, claim_requirements, and loss_amount to identify coverage gaps. Optionally include secondary_policies for comprehensive analysis. Returns gap identification and coverage adequacy assessment.

identified_gaps.description: List of specific coverage gaps found

total_coverage_available.description: Total coverage available from all sources

uncovered_amount.description: Amount of loss not covered by available insurance
